review: This is replacing my Roku XD. Although I love the roku it was missing a couple things, which is why I got the apple tv. Those reasons being 1. optical audio output 2. streaming videos from a mac or pc. The Apple Tv was easy to setup just like the roku and I got everything to work. Dolby digital, 1080p, my netflix, youTube which was not included in my roku and video/audio streaming was easy to setup. All you have to do is sign on to your apple ID on your pc or mac and enable home sharing. Enter in the same apple id on the apple tv and your good to go. The reason why i gave this 4 stars is its lack of being able to add channels like amazon instant video to it. So far I like it and will post an update if I get any issues.
